definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: But even that makes insecure Pakistanis jumpy.
sentences.chinese: 但是即使那樣也使感覺不安全的巴基斯坦人心驚肉跳。

sentences.english: That old house is an eerie place even in the day.
sentences.chinese: 那棟老屋即使在白天也有一種神祕可怖的氣氛。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他們還可以能夠重新編輯，即使它張貼的職位。

sentences.english: As you can tell, she is STILL in heavy demand even after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 即使這麼多年後，楊紫瓊仍然片約不斷。

sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢華的祭奠也算不虛此行吧。

sentences.english: It's not a decision you'll regret, even if L.A. winds up losing in a blowout.
sentences.chinese: 即使快船被虐，你也不會後悔這個決定。

sentences.english: That is, if you are one of these commune communities, then you're just a small number of people.
sentences.chinese: 即使是公社，集結成的也只是個小衆團體。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望滿身傷痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: Even weight-loss surgery doesn't always help people maintain their more svelte physiques.
sentences.chinese: 即使減肥手術也並不能讓人永遠保持苗條的體型。

sentences.english: Evena railway map is close to classified information.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一張鐵路圖也近似於機密消息。

sentences.english: Even though, the erupting age of third molars is important to oral clinic.
sentences.chinese: 即使萌出的第三磨牙也很少能建立正常的咬合關係。

sentences.english: If only you the most casual greetings, can let me feel you are too warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使只是你最隨便的問候，都會讓我覺得你太暖心。

sentences.english: Even my preferred product is currently out-of-stock , I am still loyal to the website.
sentences.chinese: 即使我喜愛的商品暫時缺貨，我仍然會忠誠於此網站。

sentences.english: Even the big brains at Google are stumped.
sentences.chinese: 即使是谷歌的天才們也被難住了。

sentences.english: Even if accompanied with dreary day let us smile with teats .
sentences.chinese: 即使陰雨作伴讓我們流淚著歡笑。
即使有30%的消耗？也還有20萬人。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
